2.6 The COMMON-EXTENSIONS module

<simple-condition>

Sealed instantiable class

Summary

The class of simple conditions.

Superclasses

<format-string-condition>

Init-keywords

None.

Library

common-extensions

Module

common-extensions

Description

The class of simple conditions. It is the superclass of <simple-error>, <simple-warning>, and <simple-restart>.

Operations

condition-format-string

condition-format-args

Example
